France 4 vs. Saudi Arabia 0 in the 1998 World Cup

Information about the 1st Round Group C game played in the 1998 Soccer World Cup between the National Teams of Saudi Arabia and France with details about goals, starters and reserves, substitutions, cards and more.

Game played in the 1998 World Cup, 1st Round Group C

Date: Thursday, June 18, 1998

France 4 - 0 Saudi Arabia
Goals:
  Thierry Henry 37'
  David Trezeguet 68'
  Thierry Henry 78'
  Bixente Lizarazu 85'
